text: dol2day ("democracy online today") is a social networking platform for politically interested German speaking people launched on May 15, 2000. The site is a combination of Internet forum and multi-user dungeon with * personal pages, * discussions, * virtual parties, * groups, * chat-function, * E-mail- function, * internet radio, * chats with politicians and other celebrities and * an election of an "Internet Chancellor" for a period of four months. == Other websites == * Official website * DORA community radio website Category:Social networking Category:Radio Category:German websites
title: Dol2day
